title: Friends 'Til The End
desc:
Post 1781
- You'll kill anyone who gets in the way of your target.
- You become **Obsessed** with one Player.
- When you make any players that are not the Obsession draw 3 or more cards at the same time, the following effects apply to the Obsession:
- You see your Obsessions hand.
- They become **Exposed** for 2 turns.
- When you make the Obsession draw 2 or more cards, the following effects apply to a random Player:
- You see their hand.
- They become the new **Obsession.**
